title: MathArtStream 5 ~ Visualizing the 4th Dimension II: Retinal Path and 5D
description:
Visualizing the 4th Dimension II: Retinal Path and 5D
Jim Zhong, Shanna Dobson
In this talk, we discuss Concept Points 3, 4, and 5, of our recent paper Categorical Mental Imagery: Visualizing the 4th Spatial Dimension https://philpapers.org/rec/DOBVTT . We will discuss what we call the three-dimensional retinal perspective path and multi-origin perspective, and show animations of perspective paths in higher dimensions.  This talk is part two of our Visualizing the 4th Dimension MathArt Stream 3.
